title: VTS Kit Angular Schematic
description: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the service file, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder. Default mode is set to `libs`
path.x-prompt: Where to create new service, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder (default set to create 'libs' service, use option --shared to create shared service)?

name.description: The name of the new service.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the service?

shared.description: Specifies whether to create shared service.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.
